newsitem.title: USA: Dole says to make trade proposal, gives no details.
newsitem.headline: Dole says to make trade proposal, gives no details.

text.p: Republican presidential nominee Bob Dole said on Tuesday he would make a new proposal on trade, but gave no details of its substance or timing.
"We'll have one other proposal to make and that'll be on trade, because trade is important," Dole told a group of small businesspeople here, giving no further details.
Dole-Kemp campaign spokesman Nelson Warfield declined comment on the substance of the proposal or the timing of its announcement.

The Republican candidate made the remark on the second day of a four-day campaign swing that was taking him to seven states in the western and central parts of the country. He was scheduled to return to Washington on Thursday.
